alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brunswick and south central Columbus Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 444 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sunset Beach, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oak Island, Shallotte, Sunset Beach, Holden Beach, Ocean Isle Beach, Ocean Crest Pier, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Civie Town, Grissettown, Supply, Longwood, Seaside, Brunswick County Community College Main Campus, Russtown, Pireway, Long Beach, Ash, and Varnamtown. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
